description: Removal, excavation, transport and disposal of waste and contaminated soil in Gros Morne National Park to be completed by by [July 1, 2024].
full_summary:
**Invitation to Qualify: Stage 1 - Martins Point Former Landfill Remediation - Gros Morne National Park**
=====================================================

**Reference:** cb-2-51314113 - 5P468-23-0336/A

**Closing Date:** Tuesday, April 9, 2024, at 14:00:00 AST

**Contracting Entity:** Parks Canada

Parks Canada issues this Invitation to Qualify for Stage 1 - Martins Point Former Landfill Remediation - Gros Morne National Park. Interested suppliers are invited to submit their qualifications to demonstrate their ability to perform this work.

**Project Overview:**
--------------------------------

Parks Canada requires the removal, excavation, transport, and disposal of approximately 800 cubic meters of waste and contaminated soil, including the construction and removal of a temporary haul route in Gros Morne National Park. This work is estimated to be valued between $100,001 and $250,000, including taxes.

**Submission Requirements:**
---------------------------

To participate in this selection process, interested suppliers must submit a Stage 1 bid in two parts: a qualification package and a technical proposal. The qualification package must provide evidence of the supplier's qualifications, experience, and capacity to perform the work. The technical proposal should describe the supplier's approach to the project, including the methods they will use to remove the waste and contaminated soil.

**Contract Duration:**
----------------------

The successful supplier will be required to complete the work no later than July 1, 2024.

**Submission Deadline:**
-------------------------

All submissions must be received by Tuesday, April 9, 2024, at 14:00:00 AST. Submissions received after this date and time will not be considered.

**Contact Information:**
-----------------------

For any questions or concerns related to this solicitation, please contact Annik Piché, Contracting Authority, at (581) 398-3489 or annik.piche@pc.gc.ca.

**Documents:**
--------------

Documents related to this solicitation, including the Invitation to Qualify and the technical specifications, are available on the Government of Canada's tendering service at [http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities). Suppliers are responsible for checking the website regularly for updates and addenda.

**Language of Submission:**
-------------------------

Both English and French are official languages of Canada. Suppliers may submit their bids in either language
